meta.title: Verify Email
meta.description: Verify your email address to complete the registration process.

VerifyEmail.title: Verify your email
VerifyEmail.description: We've sent a verification email to your address. Please click the link in the email to complete your registration.
VerifyEmail.error_message: Error sending verification email. Please try again later.

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
ForgotPassword.description: Enter your email address below and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
ForgotPassword.email_error: Please enter a valid email address.
ForgotPassword.success_message: Password reset email sent! Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.
ForgotPassword.error_not_configured: Email service is not configured. Please contact support.
ForgotPassword.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
ForgotPassword.error_user_not_found: No account found with this email address.
ForgotPassword.error_rate_limit: Too many requests. Please wait a few minutes before trying again.
ForgotPassword.error_email_rate_limit: Email rate limit exceeded. Please wait a few minutes before requesting another password reset email.
ForgotPassword.error_unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

meta.title: Reset Password
meta.description: Create a new password to regain access to your account.

ResetPassword.title: Reset your password
ResetPassword.description: Please create a new password for your account.
ResetPassword.success_message: Password successfully reset! You can now sign in with your new password.
ResetPassword.error_message: Error resetting password. Please try again later.

meta.title: Email Verified
meta.description: Your email has been successfully verified.

EmailVerified.title: Email Verified!
EmailVerified.description: Thank you for verifying your email address. Your account is now fully activated.

Error.default: An error occurred. Please try again later.
Error.expired_token: Your token has expired or is invalid. Please request a new reset link.
Error.invalid_credentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
Error.email_exists: This email address is already in use. Please use a different email or try signing in.
Error.weak_password: Password is too weak. Please use at least 8 characters including letters, numbers, and special characters.
Error.passwords_not_match: Passwords don't match. Please ensure both password fields are identical.
Error.user_not_found: No user found with this email. Please check your email or create a new account.
Error.verification_failed: Email verification failed. Please try resending the verification email.
Error.reset_failed: Password reset failed. Please request a new reset link.
Error.server_error: Server error. Please try again later.
Error.unauthorized: Unauthorized access. Please sign in to continue.

Success.password_reset_email: Password reset link sent to your email!
Success.signup: Sign up successful! Please check your email for verification.
Success.signout: You have been successfully signed out.
